plot: Homer goes to Dr. Frink to help him recover his memories from the night before, and he discovers, based on his interpretation of the memories, that Marge is having an affair.
title: "The Simpsons" Eternal Moonshine of the Simpson Mind
plot_es: Homer goes to Dr. Frink to help him recover his memories from the night before, and he discovers, based on his interpretation of the memories, that Marge is having an affair.
original_name: "The Simpsons" Eternal Moonshine of the Simpson Mind
plot_en: Homer goes to Dr. Frink to help him recover his memories from the night before, and he discovers, based on his interpretation of the memories, that Marge is having an affair.
